name: Invesco Ltd.
description: Invesco Ltd. is a global investment management firm that provides a wide range of investment solutions for clients around the world. Founded in 1935, Invesco has grown to be a leading independent investment management firm with a focus on delivering strong investment performance and exceptional client service. The company offers a diverse array of investment products, including mutual funds, exchange-traded funds (ETFs), and institutional investment strategies across various asset classes, including equity, fixed income, and multi-asset solutions. Invesco operates through several well-known investment brands, including Invesco, PowerShares, and Trimark. The firm is dedicated to responsible investing and aims to integrate environmental, social, and governance (ESG) factors into its investment processes. Invesco's mission is to help clients achieve their financial goals by providing innovative investment solutions and maintaining strong relationships built on trust and transparency. With headquarters in Atlanta, Georgia, Invesco serves retail and institutional clients globally and is committed to adapting to the evolving needs of the investment landscape.
